<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pristine Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1716) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Verdant Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1711)

</column>

---

Your [verdant weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1711) can cut through the resistances of magical creatures. The weapon is treated as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) and [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379). If you critically hit a creature that has a weakness to cold iron or silver, the target takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) as the primal energies within your weapon slow its natural healing.
name: Pristine Weapon
